caption: API
description: The API, or Application Programming Interface, object represents  information pertaining to an API request and response.
name: api

group.description: The information pertaining to the API group.

request.description: Details pertaining to the API request.

response.description: Details pertaining to the API response.

service.description: The information pertaining to the API service.

token.description: The API or client token used to authenticate or authorize the API request. This attribute contains the base token object that represents: (1) IdP-issued client tokens (type_id: 6) such as Okta API tokens or Microsoft Entra ID Application Registration client secrets, or (2) generic API tokens/keys (type_id: 7) used for SaaS application authentication. Use this attribute when the API request was authenticated using a token that should be tracked as part of the API activity event. Note: Protocol-specific authentication tokens (Kerberos, OIDC, SAML) should be represented using authentication_token in authentication events, not in API activity events.

version.description: The version of the API service.
